website_summaries.verdict: This durable Curious George plush does double duty by teaching kids to efficiently tie a knot and snap a snap, while being an all-around adorable monkey pal.
pros: Curious George’s red overalls teach kids to practice dressing with an array of snaps, fasteners, buttons, straps, and knots
cons: A little pricy, but it’s an educational cuddle toy

customer_reviews.title: Good and lovely toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and size toy for 2 yr old. Immediately fell in love with it and knew what this was. Even older brother got sad to not to get one. Looks good, bright colors, large features. The only weird part is the tie string - it is made out of very cheap material, not really a strong solid cord, but rather some soft mesh string - so the kids managed to unravel it in just a minute. Sort of disappointing to parents but kids seem to be fine about it, not too upset.
customer_reviews.author: L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great size, soft, cute, and fun! Clothing on stuffy could be a better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We love this Curious George Stuffy! I got this for my 2.5 year old son who watches the show, religiously! haha It is such a great size and so soft! The material for the clothing could be better quality... it feels cheap and I'm sure within time will fall apart but George himself seems like a great quality. The velcro pocket is tricky to undo for my toddler, even for myself, but it might wear out and become easy within time. 5 stars bc over all... this is a great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but maybe not the best learning toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler specifically to help him learn how to fasten clothes in different ways, but he's never been interested in that aspect of it. He loves his George on its own, though! It's very easy to wash, nice and soft, and a great companion for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift to add to my mom's Curious George collection! My mom has been talking about this specific one for a while and I'm glad I found him! The only thing I would critique is that the laces on top of the overalls unties really easily, but it's nothing that some hot glue can't fix!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and teachable toy.
customer_reviews.text: I watch my Granddaughter on week days. We sit together and watch 2 episodes Curious George every morning. I record episodes because every afternoon she asks to watch Monkey. So her second birthday last month had a Curious George theme she loved he Gund Monkey
customer_reviews.author: osusailer

customer_reviews.title: George plus ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sweet granddaughter as a Christmas gift. She loves her George! This is a lovely, well made stuffed toy. Bonus points for the teachable clothing fasteners on this guy! ❤️ it! She does too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Downing

customer_reviews.title: George is a big hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable! I got it for my 3 year old grandson, who is a big Curious George fan. Usually he doesn't like stuffed animals, but since this was is George AND has things to do on it, it was a hit!! Only suggestion is: it would be nice if it also had a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: SuziSpirit

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, well made
customer_reviews.text: He is perfect! Super soft plush, excellent size, well made. He is true to character likeness (does not look fake or anything), excellent plush that my daughter loves!
customer_reviews.author: SBloise

customer_reviews.title: Great toy / learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My son is a huge fan of Curious George so we have fun playing with this stuffed animal. He is only two so he can't do everything but this is a great tool to help him learn :) Once he does learn it will still be a great stuffed animal to play with. * Note: the clothes do not come off completely, this is a little disappointing as you can't take them off to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Curious George
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Grandson loves it he now has two the original he calls George An this one is Curious! Exactly as described, and so super soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Surprise to Nana
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not what I thought he would be . He looks like George but for some reason my almost 4 year old grandson who loves George pulled him out of the box he was wraped in and said, "a money Nana" . I was so surprised as I thought he would love him but it didn't turn out this way, to him it's a money and not the Curious George on cartoons . Funny , I got the surprised .
customer_reviews.author: Bubba's sidekick

customer_reviews.title: Cute plush for learning practical skills
customer_reviews.text: Cute plush for assisting young kids learn practical skills like buttons, velco, snaps, tie etc.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: ... in varying forms and this one is my least favorite. It is a very nice size and was ...
customer_reviews.text: We own about 6 of these Georges in varying forms and this one is my least favorite. It is a very nice size and was soft, but the button came off pretty quickly and the string and such are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is a go to gift for one year olds. It's a teaching toy and best of all for moms, it's quiet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: This doll is so CUTE! High quality and amazing size!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute Learning plush toy
customer_reviews.text: George was cute and helps with snaps, bottons, tying laces. I wish it had a zipper. It's a good size, soft and perfect for hugging. Outfit is removable.
customer_reviews.author: kimbacaffeinate

customer_reviews.title: So adorable, almost want one for myself!
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter than I expected. Very soft as all Gund plush products are. Very nice packaging. The learning concept adds a great touch to an adorable gift. Nice for girls or boys. I bought this for my nephew and can't wait to see the look on his face when he opens it! I also got him the anniversary addition of the Curious George stories to go along with it. Highly recommend, very good seller.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cole

customer_reviews.title: Curious George stuffed animal with teaching tools for snaps, ...
customer_reviews.text: Curious George stuffed animal with teaching tools for snaps, buttons, etc. Just the right size for a small child to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have loved curious George for a lot of years, they are very soft and cuddly and very kid friendly.I always buy them for my son who has the same name , now he has a son so I pass the touch to him we have quite a few and would recommend it to any one with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jean George

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for my autistic grandson!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift and it is amazing! Love this item! Beautiful! Arrived on time and I couldn't be happier with George!
customer_reviews.author: Roxee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, wish the overalls came off.
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable, very soft, much larger than I imagined (16" is 16" and yet I was still surprised), and well worth the price. The only remark I would make is that the overalls are sewn onto the George doll at the shoulders and my son is not a fan of this detail. It would be better if they came off-- and for that reason I plan to take a seam ripper to these little areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid F.

customer_reviews.title: Silly monkey George
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stuffy! Great size for a toddler and made well. I love curious George and this made a great gift for my 2 year old. Soft and snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeforclosers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item at a great price for my granddaughter who she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nascarphillyfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. The quality is nice and hope that it will be enjoyed by toddler who watches "monkey" often.
customer_reviews.author: Wannie

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old is a big fan of Curious George and fell in love immediately. Very well made and super soft and cuddly. An A+ buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mariely Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely ADORABLE! My son will love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ADORABLE! My son will love this. Only down side is it didn't come in a box for easy wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Kylene Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teaching snuggle buddy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old who loves Curious George and not only does it teach him, it snuggles with him when he is sick.
customer_reviews.author: Illusory

customer_reviews.title: Good variety & quality of fasteners
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft or cuddly as I expected from Gund.
customer_reviews.author: Nanuschka

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my niece's birthday. Absolutely loved this. Carries him around like he's real! We will be purchasing the my size george for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Paula & Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to LOVE this he is crazy about curious george
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Curious George plush
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality my grandson is 4 and he sleeps with it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Letty4jesus

customer_reviews.title: It's just a stuffed animal - not a learning toy
customer_reviews.text: This Curious George is very cute. He's pretty big so that's great. But the "learning" aspect of this stuffed animal is really not there. Sure my daughter could open and close all the fasteners but she doesn't so I typically have an untied bow and unbuckled coveralls to put back together. I bought it specifically to use as a decoration at her 2nd birthday party - and for that purpose it was perfect. And she does love it and he sleeps with the rest of her plush collection in her bed.
customer_reviews.author: FKHamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is crazy about his Curious George Teach. I am very pleas with it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth vanDerwarker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like pictured and is good quality. My granddaughter loves it!

customer_reviews.text: What a fun thing for my great nephew's first birthday!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so very cute. am looking forward to my grandchildren playing with him when they come to visit.

customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo adores this! It is the perfect size and is very nicely made.

customer_reviews.text: This has been a great learning toy for our 1yr old. He loves Curious George and we can use this to help teach him.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson. He loves his George shirts but for some reason this monkey scares him!

customer_reviews.text: Yes I love it I haven't yet give him to my grandaughter yet as it is for her birthday end of October

customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 3 year old nephew and it has already fallen apart do not recommend. The button came off and the overall snap busted. I ended up getting the george that just comes with a red shirt

customer_reviews.title: Learning

customer_reviews.text: This was so cute. It seems a little on the delicate side as far as durability time will tell though.

product_meta.title: GUND Curious George Teach Me Plush
product_meta.description: This 16” Curious George plush features adorable working overalls that help teach kids five essential dressing skills: buttoning buttons, snapping snaps, fastening straps, using touch-and-close fasteners, and tying knots. Surface-washable. Ages 1+. About GUND: For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability.
feature_bullets: Features adorable working overalls that help teach kids five essential dressing skills

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
